section.name: Default Page
section.p: You can set the default page to a special url in the config. If the browser calls then the root of the instance it get redirected to this page.

If the user calls a not existing page the container shows a 404 page and returns the error code 404. You can change this in the web.xml.
<error-page> <error-code>404</error-code> <location>/home.html</location> </error-page>
